program: Master of Engineering Management (MEM) — Pratt School of Engineering

sections.text: Duke’s MEM blends technical depth with business and leadership training to prepare engineers for product, operations, and technology management roles.

items: Core in marketing, finance, management, and intellectual property
Technical electives across engineering and data/AI topics
sections.text: Students complete business-focused core courses plus technical electives; many pursue internships or practicums to apply learning.

items: Bachelor’s in engineering or related field
Completion of approved plan of study
sections.text: Admissions expect a technical background; program can be completed full-time on campus or via distance formats.
Graduates take on roles in product management, operations, consulting, data/AI, and engineering leadership.
